title: Transfers
body:
its been 2 months since the last update 
when are this tranfers going live
i want to know cuz i need to keep my money you know

replies.body: Looks like [**HollyMonster was able to provide a bit of an update recently**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) in her stickied post! ATM, it looks like they're aiming for late January/Early February, as well as planned discounts for transfers when they are working again.
Probably around mid year with how Riot operates.
